name: Drag (itch)
description:
A game that introduces interesting new mechanics. You will manage your two companions and fight for the rail card to try to push it further. Only working together they will be able to progress, but there will be many obstacles in your way. Level is procedurally generated. Good luck!

TIPS: 

  • Get rail cart unstuck with Blue one - charge at it. 
  • Remove obstacles with Yellow one - stab or shoot. 

My Twitter: https://twitter.com/Droldov 

Music by: https://www.facebook.com/dusan.kolak 

As always I hope you enjoy playing as much as I did making it. The game was made for #GMTKJam in about 48h. I learned so much making it so thank you GMTK!
